title: Sunnex Gym Gloves, Workout Gloves, Fingerless Gloves for Weightlifting, Lightweight Breathable Fitness Gloves, Sports Gloves for Training Lifting Weight Cycling Climbing Rowing
features: High quality material, maximum comfort - free exchange if you buy an inappropriate size. Made of high-quality stretchy fabric, lightweight and breathable, these gym gloves for men and women are specially designed to achieve the highest level of comfort. Moisture-wicking and quick-drying mesh fabric ensures that your hands stay dry and comfortable even during intense sports. No burden on your hands, you can focus on your training at any time!
description: Sunnex Gym fitness training gloves – meet all your daily fitness training requirements. Why choose Sunnex fitness gloves for men and women? ✔ Premium fabric with super elasticity and breathability makes these sports gloves comfortable to wear and promises a snug fit when your hands move. ✔ Padded palms provide complete protection against abrasions and prevent pain, blisters and discomfort during and after exercise. ✔ Moisture wicking and quick-drying mesh fabric ensures your hands stay dry and comfortable during exercise. ✔ Strong Velcro wrists allow easy adjustment for all hands and wrist sizes. ✔ Easy to take off with pull tabs on the fingers even when the gloves are soaked in sweat. ✔ The simple yet stylish look of these training gloves fits perfectly with all your fitness clothing and daily outfit. ✔ Versatile application including gym, fitness, weightlifting, strength training, cycling, rowing, climbing and more. For more information about the product, packaging and our return policy, please do not hesitate to contact us."
